Package com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.encryption

Class EncryptedWebViewClient

java.lang.Object
android.webkit.WebViewClient
com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.encryption.EncryptedWebViewClient
public class EncryptedWebViewClient extends android.webkit.WebViewClient
This web view client can decrypt assets on the fly.

  • Constructor Details

    • EncryptedWebViewClient

      public EncryptedWebViewClient(android.webkit.WebViewClient delegate, android.content.res.AssetManager assetManager, String encryptedAssetPrefix, AssetInputStreamFactory assetInputStreamFactory)
      Creates a new EncryptedWebViewClient.
      Parameters:
      delegate - the web view client to which all method invocations will be delegated.
      assetManager - the asset manager that can create input streams for encrypted assets.
      encryptedAssetPrefix - a magic prefix value by which the assets to be decrypted can be recognized.
      assetInputStreamFactory - the input stream factory that can decrypt the assets.
